title: How to Make a Quick & Easy Alfredo Sauce

steps.headline: Pour the can of evaporated milk into a 2 quart saucepan.
Add the stick of butter or margarine and the seasonings to the milk.
Cook the mixture over medium-high heat until the liquid comes to a rapid boil.
Turn off the heat and add all of the Parmesan cheese.
Keep stirring until the cheese is melted.
steps.description: The sauce will thicken when this happens.

steps.headline: Serve over pasta or as a tasty dip.

text: Pour the can of evaporated milk into a 2 quart saucepan.  Add the stick of butter or margarine and the seasonings to the milk.  Cook the mixture over medium-high heat until the liquid comes to a rapid boil.  Turn off the heat and add all of the Parmesan cheese. Stir rapidly. Keep stirring until the cheese is melted. The sauce will thicken when this happens. Serve over pasta or as a tasty dip.
